attributes.action: ensure that his office replies to all letters that are sent to him at No 10 Downing Street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I heard Joanna Lumley say yesterday (4th May) in the House of Commons that she had written three letters to Gordon Brown that had not been replied to. I myself wrote a letter to him on 21st April on an extremely important subject which has also seemingly been ignored. This is not how Government for the people should be run.

rejection.details: Number 10 replies to all letters posted to the PM. However due to the very large volume of letters received every day, this can sometimes take several weeks.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
